Colorado ala bụ ebe nrụgide dị ala nke na-emepụta na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Colorado ma ọ bụ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa Anyanwụ New Mexico, nke a na-ahụkarị n'oge oyi

Mgbè e guzobere ya, usoro ahụ na-agafe Great Plains. Colorado Low nwèrè ike ịmepụta nnukwu mmiri ozuzo, ma nwee ọwụwa anyanwụ na n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa Anyanwụ, na-emetụta mpaghara dị anya n'ébé ndị dị anya n"ébé ugwu dị ka Winnipeg na n'akụkụ ọwụwa a dị ányá n-eru n'ụsọ oké osimiri Atlantic
Ọ bụrụ na ọnọdụ dị n'elu dị mma, mmiri jet nwere ike ịkwaga ala n'ébé ndịda, na-eweta mmiri ozuzo na-ezo ruo Texas
Mgbè a na-akwagharị ya n'ébé ndịda, a na-akpọkarị usoro ahụ "acha anụnụ anụnụ n'ébé ugwu"

[ntụgharị dị mkpa] N'okporo ụzọ ndị ọzọ, ala Colorado nwèrè ike ịdị ka Alberta clipper. N'oge oyi, Colorado lows na-akpata ọtụtụ snow nke Midwest na-enweta; Otú ọ dị, usoro ógè okpomọkụ nwere ike ịkpata usoro convective na-adịte aka, gụnyere ihu igwe siri ike. Ógè opupu ihe ubi na mmalite ógè okpomọkụ Colorado low cyclogenesis nwèrè ike ịkpata nnukwu ajọ ifufe na Great Plains na Midwest.
